insert into achievement(achievement_teacher_id,achievement_teacher_name, achievement_year,achievement_name,achievement_level,achievement_category, achievement_evidence1,achievement_evidence2,achievement_evidence3, achievement_kpi_s34,achievement_kpi_category,achievement_rank, achievement_kpi,achievement_note) values
(#{item.achievementTeacherId},#{item.achievementTeacherName}, #{item.achievementYear},#{item.achievementName}, #{item.achievementLevel},#{item.achievementCategory}, #{item.achievementEvidence1},#{item.achievementEvidence2}, #{item.achievementEvidence3},#{item.achievementKpiS34}, #{item.achievementKpiCategory},#{item.achievementRank}, #{item.achievementKpi},#{item.achievementNote})
AS t1(r1,r2,r3,r4,r5,r6,r7,r8,r9,r10,r11,r12,r13,r14) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE achievement_teacher_id=r1,achievement_teacher_name=r2, achievement_year=r3,achievement_name=r4, achievement_level=r5,achievement_category=r6, achievement_evidence1=r7,achievement_evidence2=r8, achievement_evidence3=r9,achievement_kpi_s34=r10, achievement_kpi_category=r11,achievement_rank=r12, achievement_kpi=r13,achievement_note=r14
